attributes.action: Ensure that Gordon Brown will not succeed him as the next Prime Minister of England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a patriot of England I am totally against the idea of Gordon Brown becoming Prime Minister because I don't believe that he has the best interests of our country at the top of his agenda. He may be better served in a position in the Scottish parliament.

I have Scotish blood myself but truely believe that England should only be represented by a true Englishman born and bred.
